book.author: Gambardella, Matthew
book.title: XML Developer's Guide
book.description: An in-depth look at creating applicationswith XML.

book.author: Ralls, Kim
book.title: Midnight Rain
book.description: A former architect battles corporate zombies,an evil sorceress, and her own childhood to become queenof the world.

book.author: Corets, Eva
book.title: Maeve Ascendant
book.description: After the collapse of a nanotechnologysociety in England, the young survivors lay thefoundation for a new society.

book.author: Corets, Eva
book.title: Oberon's Legacy
book.description: In post-apocalypse England, the mysteriousagent known only as Oberon helps to create a new lifefor the inhabitants of London. Sequel to MaeveAscendant.

book.author: Corets, Eva
book.title: The Sundered Grail
book.description: The two daughters of Maeve, half-sisters,battle one another for control of England. Sequel toOberon's Legacy.

book.author: Randall, Cynthia
book.title: Lover Birds
book.description: When Carla meets Paul at an ornithologyconference, tempers fly as feathers get ruffled.

book.author: Thurman, Paula
book.title: Splish Splash
book.description: A deep sea diver finds true love twentythousand leagues beneath the sea.

book.author: Knorr, Stefan
book.title: Creepy Crawlies
book.description: An anthology of horror stories about roaches,centipedes, scorpionsand other insects.

book.author: Kress, Peter
book.title: Paradox Lost
book.description: After an inadvertant trip through a HeisenbergUncertainty Device, James Salway discovers the problemsof being quantum.

book.author: O'Brien, Tim
book.title: Microsoft .NET: The Programming Bible
book.description: Microsoft's .NET initiative is explored indetail in this deep programmer's reference.

book.author: O'Brien, Tim
book.title: MSXML3: A Comprehensive Guide
book.description: The Microsoft MSXML3 parser is covered indetail, with attention to XML DOM interfaces, XSLT processing,SAX and more.

book.author: Galos, Mike
book.title: Visual Studio 7: A Comprehensive Guide
book.description: Microsoft Visual Studio 7 is explored in depth,looking at how Visual Basic, Visual C++, C#, and ASP+ areintegrated into a comprehensive developmentenvironment.
